name: the finance and property survival guide

episodes.title: From the Vault: Cons & Cults with Sarah Steel
episodes.description:
Sarah Steel is the author of "Do as I Say", a book about cults, charisma and coercive control and the host of Let's Talk About Sects podcast. 
You can check out her book here: ⁠Do As I Say: How cults control, why we join them, and what they teach us about bullying, abuse and coercion - Pan Macmillan Australia⁠You can check out her podcast here: ⁠Let's Talk About Sects - Episodes
